'''Thistle Brook''' was a stream of the [[Eastfarthing]] of [[the Shire]]. From [[Green Hill Country]] it flowed south-east round [[Woody End]] and through the village of [[Willowbottom]] before its waters emptied into the River [[Shirebourn]].<ref>{{FR|Part}}</ref>

Thistles presumably grew around it.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. lx</ref>
